power.title: Blazing Brand
power.fluff: Your attack burns your god's symbol onto the enemy, a beacon to your companions
power.keyword: Divine, Fire, Reliable; Implement or Weapon

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude (weapon), or
Charisma vs. Fortitude (implement)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier fire damage (Weapon) or 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage (Implement), and the target is branded (save ends).
While branded, the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage, and grants combat advantage to your allies that are adjacent to it.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.
If you use this power against the same target before the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage on the attack.

power.title: Blood of the Mighty
power.fluff: You draw on your own life force to deal a decisive blow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take damage equal to 5 + one-third your level. This damage cannot be resisted or negated in any way.
If this damage reduces your hit points to 0 or fewer, you do not become unconscious from the dying condition before this attack has been resolved.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: 2 + your Charisma modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
You immediately regain the use of this power.

power.title: Driving Blades
power.fluff: Such is the ferocity of your attack, your enemy falls back with each strike

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and shift 1 square into the space it vacated, and the target is wounded by your ferocity (save ends).
While wounded, the target takes ongoing 5 damage, and each time you hit it with a melee attack, you can push the target 1 square and shift 1 square into the space it vacated.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: Ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack when you charge.

power.title: Frost of Letherna
power.fluff: Ice and frost swirl around you, expanding quickly into a whirling blizzard that makes it difficult for your enemies to flee

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of hindering frost until the end of your next turn.
When an enemy enters the zone or starts its turn there, it is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Glorious Charge
power.fluff: You wade into battle and urge your allies to greater heights

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points equal to one-third your level + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack when you charge.

power.title: Majestic Halo
power.fluff: You shine with divine radiance that sears your enemies and commands their respect

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will (weapon), or
Charisma vs. Will (implement)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage as a Weapon attack, or 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage as an Implement attack, and the target is subject to your divine saction until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you is subject to your divine sanction until the end of its current turn.

power.title: On Pain of Death
power.fluff: You invoke a prayer that wracks your foe with terrible pain and causes further pain whenever it attacks

section.text: Using this power does not trigger a reactive strike from the target for using a ranged attack.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is compelled to not attack (save ends).

While compelled, once per round when it makes any attack, the target takes damage. The damage equals 3 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, or half this amount if your attack was a miss.

power.title: Paladin's Judgement
power.fluff: Your melee attack punishes your enemy and heals an ally

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Radiant Delirium
power.fluff: You engulf your enemy in searing ribbons of radiance

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
